description.value:
You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3G8xUlgCjRmRJNfP]{Quick Squeeze} skill feat, and if you're a master in Acrobatics, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze} at full Speed.

Whenever you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} using Acrobatics, the creature you Escaped from is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.

rules.text: Whenever you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} using Acrobatics, the creature you Escaped from is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.
rules.title: Success
